bike.description: Specialized SL4 FACT 10r carbon, FACT construction, tapered/shaped headtube, compact race design, 1-3/8" lower bearing, OSBB

components.description: Specialized FACT carbon full monocoque, OS race for 1-3/8" bearing, hollow carbon dropouts
1-1/8" upper and 1-3/8" lower, stainless steel cartridge bearings, 8mm carbon cone spacer, w/ 20mm of carbon spacers
